document.full_text: more than 80,000 britons claim payments for long-term sick leave because of obesity or drug or alcohol addiction, contributing to a 7 billion pound annual bill for incapacity benefit, the government said on thursday.
document.title: over 80,000 in uk on benefits due to addiction and obesity
